title: Kenny Wayne Shepherd - Trouble is...  (MP3-320kbps) - [=Faith=]
description:
Kenny Wayne Shepherd Band - Trouble is...

Trouble Is ... is the second album by American blues solo artist Kenny Wayne Shepherd. It features the No. 1 Mainstream Rock Tracks hit "Blue on Black". The album also spawned three further hits including "Slow Ride", "Somehow, Somewhere, Someway", and "Everything is Broken", a Bob Dylan cover. It also features a cover of "I Don't Live Today" by Jimi Hendrix. It is the first of two albums featuring Noah Hunt on vocals. Trouble Is ... was certified Gold by the RIAA in 1998 and certified Platinum in 1999.
